record.dc:title: 3BE22, 15BE22, Boone County, Kentucky. Cleek Village. View of (-) 95 ft. cut.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: View of (-) 95 ft. cut from south showing fireplaces. Men in far end working on F. #1. Feature 1: Charred logs. These small logs appeared to have been part of a structure as there was no evidence of the soil surrounding them haveing been burned. There is also a remote possibility that they could be the remains of a burned stump.
record.wpa:comments: See photos 7 & 8BE22. More information, including diagram, available at institution.
record.wpa:photograph_category: Fireplaces; Trench; People Lab and Field Scenes
